trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around November 2nd 2013
Summary: much brighter than a star and much larger than one i've ever seen
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dog outside for a pee. I saw an airplane and watched it until it got near the object and then it caught my eye. It was much larger than the airplane or any visible stars in the sky. I thought it was a huge star. It flickered but mostly remained in the same place. I was all like, "Whoa" during and after the sighting. It flickered among the treetops but mostly stayed in the same place and I lost sight of it when I walked inside.
